verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Majestic sweetness sits enthroned Upon the Savior's brow; His head with radiant glories crowned, His lips with grace o'erflow, His lips with grace o'erflow.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: No mortal can with Him compare, Among the sons of men; Fairer is He than all the fair That fill the heav'nly train, That fill the heav'nly train.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: He saw me plunged in deep distress, He flew to my relief; For me He bore the shameful cross And carried all my grief, And carried all my grief.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: To Him I owe my life and breath, And all the joys I have; He makes me triumph over death, And saves me from the grave, And saves me from the grave.
